item.title: [PI] Item Is Showing As Dwarf Remains
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

Everytime i add Dragonclaws, I Get Dwarf Remains… I Added The .Dats…

Here Is What I Did.

I Download The Models:

43660
44590

And I Added Them Into My Cache/Data

Then I Added This Code In My Itemdef.java

/* Hardcoded items start here */ /**/ if(i == 14484) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165 itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt200 itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); }

But All I Get Is Dwarf Remains…

(AND YES I DID COMPILE)

And When I Say “Add model”
I Type In 44590 It Does Add The Models But It Still Stays At Dwarf Remains.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Item Is Showing As Dwarf Remains
